Pairing 1
Montserrat and Hind were designed to work together using similar proportions and weights. We chose this combination of typefaces because they have a friendly, approachable appearance, are optimized for the web and are very legible.

Montserrat
Free for use via Google Fonts. Montserrat is a new libre sans text typeface for the web, inspired by the signage found in a historical neighborhood of Buenos Aires. It is designed for use together with Hind, and is harmonized across metrics, proportions, weights and design.
  • normal - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
Open Sans
Free for use via Google Fonts. Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.
  • normal - 17px
    Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988.
  • italic - 17px
    Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988.
  • bold - 17px
    Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988.
  • bold italic - 17px
    Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988.
California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988. But getting wiped out in the June primary to replace retiring Sen. Barbara Boxer would be a new low for a party drifting toward irrelevance in the Golden State -- one that even many Democratic leaders don't want to see happen.

Pairing 2
Noto Serif and Open Sans were designed to work together using similar proportions and weights. We chose this combination of typefaces because they have a friendly, approachable appearance, are optimized for the web and are very legible.

Roboto
Free for use via Google Fonts. Noto Serif is a transitional serif typeface with humanistic terminals. It is designed for use together with Open Sans, and is harmonized across metrics, proportions, weights and design.

Roboto
Free for use via Google Fonts. Open Sans is a humanist sans serif typeface designed by Steve Matteson, Type Director of Ascender Corp. Open Sans was designed with an upright stress, open forms and a neutral, yet friendly appearance. It was optimized for print, web, and mobile interfaces, and has excellent legibility characteristics in its letterforms.

Pairing 3
Utopia harkens back to the transitional serif fonts from the 18th-century. We chose this font for its more classic style, readability and multiple weights.

Proxima Nova is one of Typekit's more popular sans serif fonts for the web. With many weights to choose from and its clean geometric style it pairs well with many fonts, including classic-style fonts like Utopia. We chose this pairing with Utopia because we like the juxtaposition between classic and contemporary styles

Oswald
Licensed use via Typekit. Utopia is an Adobe Originals text face designed by Robert Slimbach in 1989. It combines the vertical stress and pronounced stroke contrast of 18th-century Transitional types like Baskerville and Walbaum with contemporary innovations in character shapes and stroke details.
  • normal - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
Quattrocento
Licensed use via Typekit. Proxima Nova straddles the gap between typefaces like Futura and Akzidenz Grotesk. The result is a hybrid combining humanistic proportions with a somewhat geometric appearance.

Pairing 4
Another combination designed to work together. The PT slab serif is friendly yet authoritative and makes for a great news headline font.

PT Sans is a contemporary, readable, humanistic style font with multiple weights for design flexibility.

PT Serif
Free for use via Google Fonts. PT Serif is a transitional slab serif typeface with humanistic terminals. It is designed for use together with PT Sans, and is harmonized across metrics, proportions, weights and design.
  • normal - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
  • bold italic - 24px
    California Senate primary likely to weed out the Republicans
PT Sans
Free for use via Google Fonts. PT Sans is based on Russian sans serif types of the second part of the 20th century, but at the same time has distinctive features of contemporary humanistic designs. The family consists of 8 styles: 4 basic styles, 2 captions styles for small sizes, and 2 narrow-styletiles styles for economic type setting.
  • normal - 17px
    Losing U.S. Senate races in California is old hat for the GOP. The party has lost every one since 1988.

Colors: Introduction
The project brief outlines several conceptual vignettes that would influence the site design. One vignette that rose to the surface is the idea of a spectrum of color tones from the Bay Area representing its climate and landforms which are as diverse and unique as the residents who call it home. Visual, diverse, bold. The following color palettes are inspired by the myriad of colors that paint the picturesque landscape of the Bay Area. We will use a combination of colors to create a branded look for the site while supporting the content and focusing the users attention on important calls to action.
Palette 1
Vibrant, bright, bold.
